name: Từ vựng Tiếng Anh dụng cụ thể thao (Sports Equipment)

words.example: The children played with a red ball in the park.
She hit the tennis ball with her new racket.
The baseball player swung the bat and hit a home run.
He used a golf club to hit the ball onto the green.
The volleyball went over the net.
The striker scored a goal in the final minute.
They played basketball on the outdoor court.
The football match was played on a muddy field.
The runners sprinted around the track.
We went for a swim in the pool.
